name: Berrywitched!
description:
Berrywitched! is a lovely twisted game where you, our protagonist, are lost within a forest that is supposedly cursed. You pass out, only to be awoken by a cute girl claiming to be The Strawberry Witch.

Berrywitched! takes around 30-60 minutes to complete and was made in roughly two weeks for the Strawberry to the Heart game jam! It's my first ever game project, I hope you like it!

A few people have asked if they can post playthroughs  of this game to youtube- you can 100% make playthroughs of this game! I would love to see it honestly! :D

CONTENT WARNING-

This is a light horror game that contains topics that may be triggering to those who are easily disturbed. This game includes mentions/depictions of: Violence, Blood, Mild gore, Self harm, Suicide, Killing, and Death.
